mapper.select: SELECT TEAM FROM SMEMBER WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}

SELECT ONUM, MAX(REGDATE) AS REGDATE, COUNT(*) AS CNT, MAX(EMPNO) AS EMPNO, MAX(PROCODE) AS PROCODE FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT O.ONUM as onum, O.EMPNO as EMPNO, O.PROCODE as PROCODE, O.OAMOUNT as OAMOUNT, O.OCOMMENT as OCOMMENT, O.REGDATE as REGDATE, O.CHECKS as CHECKS , O.DELETED as DELETED, S.TEAM as TEAM FROM OREQUEST O, SMEMBER S WHERE O.EMPNO = S.EMPNO) WHERE TEAM=#{team}) WHERE CHECKS=0 GROUP BY ONUM ORDER BY ONUM DESC
